title: Enter the Big Bear
author: VD
content_html: I had an idea for Owen’s tour entrance. And it quite literally rocked. But, I have to confess, Coddington’s idea proved to be considerably more effective, given the enthusiasm of the Bears. I mean, that’s not a comedy show. That’s a freaking rock concert!
content_text:
I had an idea for Owen’s tour entrance. And it quite literally rocked. But, I have to confess, Coddington’s idea proved to be considerably more effective, given
the enthusiasm of the Bears
. I mean, that’s not a comedy show. That’s a freaking rock concert!
